item.title: Regional news 2020-05-05
item.description: Contents Al-Araby Al-Jadeed Al-Sharq Al-Awsat Aljazeera Alarabiya Al-Quds Al-Araby Ra’i Al-Youm Al-Araby Al-Jadeed Fears that imprisoned Saudi Princess Basma bint Saudi may have Corona Last month, the princess wrote on her twitter that she is imprisoned in Hair prison and her health is quickly deteriorating. She said he condition is critical and may lead to her death. She added that she has not received any medical assistance.

Contents Egypt Saudi Qatar Jordan Syria Egypt Ahram One hand protects from the pandemic and the other builds the desert Throughout Egyptian history, Sinai has never received this volume of development projects… The roads, tunnels, and bridges tht are being built will change life across all of Egypt and not just Sinai… I have seen the many giant national projects, which were accomplished by the people of Egypt under the leadership of President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi during the past years, and… I did not believe that all of these projects were completed in this record time
